metadata.title: Regular expression denial of service in LDAP schema parser (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in python-ldap. The vulnerability occurs due to a regular expression and leads to a  denial of service attack. This flaw allows an attacker to parse LDAP schema definitions from an untrusted source, leading to a crash or code execution. 
            
            MITIGATION: Check input for an excessive amount of backslashes in schemas. More than a dozen backslashes per line are atypical.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
python2-ldap3 is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
